content:
Hi,

I sent https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89825 to fix a bug in split_inclusive() when run on an empty slice. That was a little over two weeks ago. I just wanted to make sure it's not forgotten. I think the function was quite recently stabilized, so it seems good to fix it before callers start depending on the broken (AFAICT) behavior.
latency is highly... erratic. sometimes you get same-day merges sometimes it takes months.
Okay, no problem. I'll just wait then.
